commit.message:
cleanup new script files (no code changes)

- add missing header end comments
- ensure alphabetical ordering
- update copyright year and license

files.patch:

   script/sign.h \
   script/standard.h \
@@ -212,8 +212,8 @@ libbitcoin_common_a_SOURCES = \
